I was thinking about how experience level effects things like abilites 
of characters and weapons range.

For example, my "druid island" islands have low experience druids 
deliberately because the extra ability at the next highest skill level 
will drive the player nuts trying to eliminate those damn spells of 
protection after killing a faerie.
